channel.title: [PI] Clan Chat Help
channel.description: Please help me My base is [PI] I have Clan Chat with working Lootshare but when i get a kill or anyone in clan gets a kill it doesn't come up with loot at bottom of Clan Chat how do I make it so it says the drop not split it but atleast say it.
